desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 4 seconds.
notes:
All units who directly attack or cast spells on Enchantress will get slowed.
The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.
lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
name: enchantress_untouchable

desc: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.
attrib:
CREEP ENCHANT DURATION: 80
HERO MOVE SLOW: 20%/30%/40%/50%
HERO SLOW DURATION: 5.5/5.5/5.5/5.5
cmb:
65/65/65/65
30/25/20/15
lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
name: enchantress_enchant

desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.
notes:
Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.
Can heal units with spell immunity.
cmb:
125/140/155/170
45
lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
name: enchantress_natures_attendants

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.
Impetus is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The damage is capped at 2500 distance.
Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.
attrib:
DISTANCE DAMAGE: 15%/20%/25%
SCEPTER BONUS RANGE: 190/190/190
cmb:
55/60/65
0
lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
name: enchantress_impetus
